## Setup

Libraries used

```{r}

library(here)
#library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)

```

# Read in carbonate data

```{r}

dic <- read_csv(here('DIC_summary.csv'), show_col_types = FALSE) 

dic$Date <- as.Date(dic$Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")  

dic$Treatment <- as.factor(dic$Treatment)

```

# Organize data

```{r}

dic$Sample_ID <- gsub("22-", "", dic$Sample_ID)
dic$Sample_ID <- as.integer(dic$Sample_ID)
dic <- dic[order(dic$Sample_ID),]

dic$Month <- format(dic$Date, "%m")

dic <- dic %>% mutate(Spur = case_when(Plot > 7 ~ "creek",
                                       Plot < 8 ~ "woods"))

dic_Aug <- dic %>% filter(month == '08')

dic_Aug_5 <- dic_Aug %>% filter(Depth_cm == 5)
dic_Aug_15 <- dic_Aug %>% filter(Depth_cm == 15)
dic_Aug_sand <- dic_Aug %>% filter(Depth_cm == 3)

dic_15 <- dic %>% filter(Depth_cm == 15)

```

# Plot 5 cm data

```{r}

trt_colors <- c()

ggplot(dic_Aug_5, aes(Salinity_psu, DIC_umol_kg, color = Spur)) + geom_point(size = 4)
ggplot(dic_Aug_5, aes(Salinity_psu, DIC_umol_kg, color = Treatment)) + geom_point(size = 4)

# these two are plotting sums, need to plot averages
#ggplot(dic_Aug_5, aes(Treatment, Salinity_psu)) + geom_col()  
#ggplot(dic_Aug_5, aes(Treatment, DIC_umol_kg)) + geom_col()

ggplot(dic_Aug_5, aes(Treatment, Salinity_psu)) + geom_boxplot()  

ggplot(dic_Aug_5, aes(Treatment, DIC_umol_kg)) + geom_boxplot()

ggplot(dic_Aug_5, aes(Treatment, pH)) + geom_boxplot()

#ggplot(dic_Aug_5, aes(Treatment, Salinity_psu)) + geom_col() + geom_errorbar(ymin = min(dic_Aug_5$Salinity_psu), ymax = max(dic_Aug_5$Salinity_psu))
# x, ymax, ymin, alpha, color, group, linetype, size, width

```
